poem:
Title: "In the Shadow of the Bear"

In the iron jaws of war, a nation claws, 
A new commander wakes to face the dawn. 
Zelenskiy, with sanguine strokes he draws, 
His fired general, from his post now gone. 

Invaded land, Ukraine, in harsh, raw suspension,
Undulates beneath the Russian storm.
Yet, in her heart, an unyielding intention,
Defiance and fortitude in form.
